item.title: Introducing Firebase!!!

item.title: Capturing audio the native way - Android
item.description: The android platform has a very easy way that we could capture audio; either from the gadgets microphone, or a call. Lets see how we will build a custom recording application.

item.description: I spent all my time transforming VIM into an IDE, and this is an account of it.

item.title: This week
item.description: Emerging Leaders in Technology and engineering (ELiTe) began in 2009 when co-founders, and Columbia University classmates, Chelsey Roebuck and Clayton Dahlman took a summer trip to teach hands-on science in rural Ghana.
